first_line: You’ve been up on that diving board
line1: Slowing looking down, you take a dive
line2: You fall into a pool of jello
line3: Just thankful to be alive.

Title: HAPPY ENDING? (Every Thing On It)
first_line: There are no happy endings.
line1: We can only hope to have a happy start
line2: and many happy journeys
line3: those are more important than the endings.

Title: HAPPY ENDING? (Every Thing On It)
first_line: There are no happy endings.
line2: He walked into my life
line3: and broke my heart.

Title: HAPPY ENDING? (Every Thing On It)
first_line: There are no happy endings.
line1: is a way to look at it
line2: remember to start smiling
line3: or you'll feel like you're in a pit

Title: YEARS FROM NOW (Every Thing On It)
first_line: Although I cannot see your face
line1: But I can feel that you staring
line2: I know you are far away
line3: But I miss you more than ever

Title: YEARS FROM NOW (Every Thing On It)
first_line: Although I cannot see your face
line2: I still hear your goofy laughing
line3: a huge smile on your always happy face

Title: YEARS FROM NOW (Every Thing On It)
first_line: Although I cannot see your face
line1: I still imagine your clown smile
line2: I know your not laughing at all
line3: But your looks makes me laugh
